definition: to glue/to paste/to adhere/to stick to
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: Objective To discuss adhesive ileus features of multi-slice spiral CT imaging.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨粘连性肠梗阻的多层螺旋CT成像特征。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the usefulness of keratoplasty with the patients of symblepharon after burns.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察角膜移植治疗烧伤后睑球粘连的效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion FG is the adhesive which can greatly decrease the rate of adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 结论纤维蛋白胶可有效降低腹腔术后粘连发生率。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the effect of polysaccharide sulphate on prevention of postoperative intestinal adhesions.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察藻酸双酯钠预防术后肠粘连的作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To evaluate the effects of sodium hyaluronate on adhesion prevention after flexor tendon surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价透明质酸钠预防术后屈肌腱粘连的临床效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion Salpingitis and pelvic adhesion are mainly factors of repeat ectopic pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 结论输卵管炎，盆腔粘连是重复异位妊娠的主要因素。

sentences.english: Adhesion is one of the important reasons for the post-injury complications.
sentences.chinese: 粘连是引发组织损伤后并发症的主要原因之一。

sentences.english: The main postoperative complications were anterior uveitis and posterior synechia of the iris.
sentences.chinese: 术后主要并发症是前葡萄膜炎和虹膜后粘连。

sentences.english: The presence of adhesions did not change operative time.
sentences.chinese: 粘连的存在与否，并没有影响手术时间。

sentences.english: Conclusion Salpingitis and pelvic adhesion are mainly factors of repeat ectopic pr…
sentences.chinese: 结论输卵管炎，盆腔粘连是重复异位妊娠的主要因素。

sentences.english: When the glass is broken, its fragments are bound solidly to PVB film.
sentences.chinese: 即使破损，玻璃片仍然与PVB膜牢固的粘连在一起。

sentences.english: Suturing peritoneum cant prevent intestinal adhesion in the laparoscopy group.
sentences.chinese: 腹腔镜穿刺孔缝合腹膜对预防肠粘连无意义。

sentences.english: Dust the repair to prevent adhesion to outer cover.
sentences.chinese: 清整修补处以防与外胎粘连。

sentences.english: The straight-leg testing can guard against and treatconglutination of nerve root after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 直腿抬高运动锻炼可以防治术后神经根粘连。

sentences.english: The skin can become adherent to the underlying tissues.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤能和下层组织粘连。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of chymotrypsin in decreasing the rate of postoperative adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨糜蛋白酶对肌腱粘连的影响。

definition: serosa/serous membrane (smooth moist delicate membranes lining body cavities)
to glue/to paste/to adhere/to stick to
to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
